body.p: The Review mode provides an intuitive interface that enables you to view documents and document edits. To switch to this mode, tap or click the Review button. This panel presents comments, tracked changes, and document highlights. A Preview panel is also available at the bottom of the editing area. It displays the current comment or tracked change and the author who inserted it.

To insert a comment, select the text that you want to comment on and press Add comment at the bottom of the editing area. You are able to navigate between comments using the two arrows (left and right) from the Preview panel. To make changes to a comment, press Change.

ol.li: Make a selection in the document content
Tap or click the Add comment button from the bottom of the page
Input a comment in the displayed dialog. Press Comment to commit it into the document

section.title: To see the list of all comments (or tracked changes) from your document:

ol.li: Tap or click the button from the upper left side corner, or swipe from left to right. A side panel is shown with all the comments
Tap or click one of the comments to see it in the document area
On touch screen devices, swipe from left to right over a comment to activate the Remove and Change buttons. For the tracked changes the list of available actions are: Accept, Reject and Comment
To hide the list of comments, tap or click the menu button , or swipe from right to left.

section.title: To navigate through the comments (or tracked changes):

ol.li: Tap or click the left and right arrow buttons () from the bottom of the page

The current comment (or tracked change) is highlighted in the document. Also, it is displayed in the left-side Review panel. If the Review panel is not displayed, it is shown in the preview area, located in the lower part of the screen
